A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A joke filled mess\, I almost left the theater. If you love the story of Luke Skywalker and take the legacy seriously\, don't go see this movie. Disney means death to George Lucas's Star Wars that started all of this. I understand it's time to leave the old and move on but this movie is so disrespectful to the original story it's painful. Enjoy your billions\, Disney.
